items.title: Boot UI and fix rendering issues
items.summary: Run Vite dev server, open browser, fix every broken view. Tailwind, imports, component errors.

items.title: TypeScript build passes cleanly
items.summary: Run npm run build. Fix all type errors. Ensure server and UI both compile.

items.title: Test integration plugins with real credentials
items.summary: GitHub works zero-config (passing). Helicone configured but FAILING as of Feb 8. Test Vercel + Supabase with real creds. Helicone failure needs investigation — credential sync to AI proxy may not be working. ISS-003 still open. Note: Helicone is critical for AI cost tracking which blocks dogfooding.

items.title: Make architecture graph understandable for non-developers
items.summary: Rich plain-English module descriptions, relationship explanations on edges, better inter-module connection detection. ISS-007.

items.title: Docs tab — end-to-end project wiki with live updates
items.summary: Turn Docs into a full living wiki: auto-generated docs from codebase changes, nested nav with sections, search, and real-time updates when architecture changes. Phase 1 (markdown rendering, ToC, nav) is done. Phase 2: auto-generation, cross-referencing, richer content.

items.title: AI chat agent with full tool access (chat-first architecture)
items.summary: Persistent sidebar chat agent with ~40 tools across 16 domains, multi-provider model routing (OpenAI/Anthropic/Google, 58 models discovered), streaming, tool call visualization. Foundation built and working: AIService, ModelRouter, modular tool registry, ChatService, SSE API, sidebar UI. API keys in Integrations. Headless runner for programmatic AI tasks. STALLED: in_progress since Feb 7 — 3+ days without browser testing. This is the #1 critical path blocker for the entire project. Must be tested in next session.

items.title: Background AI watcher for automatic change tracking
items.summary: Partially shipped via automation engine (session 7). Engine fires on file changes, session ends, item completions, issue creates. 5 built-in automations with AI-driven execution (premium models). Scheduler runs every 60s for daily/weekly crons. STALLED: in_progress since Feb 7 but no work since automation engine was built. Remaining: git commit detection, granular file-change analysis, cheap model filtering for noise reduction. Blocked on ai-chat-agent validation (headless runner needs working AI to execute automations).

items.title: Command-P style global search across all data
items.summary: Floating search bar at top of every page. Searches roadmap, issues, ideas, changelog, codebase, systems. Grouped results with quick-jump.

items.title: Implement actual drag-and-drop in backlog kanban
items.summary: Wire up @dnd-kit. Cards draggable between Now/Next/Later columns. Drop triggers API move call.

items.title: Wire context sync to CLI and API
items.summary: CLI command: dev-track context --platform cursor. Auto-generate CLAUDE.md, copilot-instructions, etc. Auto-sync on session end.

items.title: UI design overhaul — Cursor-inspired minimalism
items.summary: Phase 1 DONE (session 5): Lucide SVG icons throughout, Cursor-minimal sidebar nav, dark theme with proper hierarchy, notification tray, dashboard v2 with health ring. Phase 2 TODO: tighter spacing, better typography on detail views, richer information density like Linear, polish card designs. STALLED: in_progress since Feb 8 — phase 2 not started. Lower priority than chat agent validation. Consider: should this be moved back to pending until chat agent is validated?

items.title: Initialization wizard for new projects
items.summary: dev-track init: scan codebase, AI infers systems, generates systems.json + roadmap items + context briefing. Populates all v2 entities from codebase analysis.

items.title: Auto-archival of old data
items.summary: Rolling window on changelog, issues, session log. Auto-archive on session end. Period summaries.

items.title: Structured code annotations for codebase explorer
items.summary: @dt-description, @dt-depends, @dt-external doc-comments parsed by scanner for rich tooltips.

items.title: Context-aware budgeting for different AI models
items.summary: Opus gets full context, GPT-4o-mini gets compressed. Auto-detect or manual config per platform.

items.title: Post-deploy hooks and always-on monitoring
items.summary: Vercel deploy webhook, Sentry webhook auto-create issues, cron health checks.

items.title: Background AI agents for R&D, docs, design
items.summary: Separate agents that run against dev-track data. R&D proposals, doc sync, design iteration.

items.title: Session lifecycle — clear start/end with AI-driven closure prompting
items.summary: Detect session starts (new chat window), log sessions automatically, push users to closure based on user profile behavior patterns. Load user profile at session start. AI prompts 'good stopping point' when context is getting long.

items.title: Session-end self-audit — DevTrack audits its own data freshness
items.summary: SHIPPED via automation engine (session 7). session-end-audit automation fires on session_ended trigger with deep AI audit. nightly-audit runs daily. weekly-report generates summaries. All use premium models. Verified working live.

items.title: User behavior profiles — experience levels, habits, interaction patterns
items.summary: AI-observed user profiles with IQ-scale intelligence score (128), cognitive profile radar chart (8 dimensions), technical skills radar chart (8 dimensions). All AI-set, read-only. Deep assessment notes. Behavior patterns user-adjustable. SVG radar charts built from scratch. Session observations array. AI-to-AI guidance section. Loaded at session start, injected into system prompts.

items.title: Paid product launch — local daemon + web platform
items.summary: Distribution: npx dev-track init (free local daemon) + web platform (paid tiers). Free tier: 1 project, 50 AI calls/day. Pro: $25-40/seat/mo. Team: $60+/seat/mo. Requires: auth, billing, team workspaces, cloud sync, multi-tenant RLS. NOT open source.

items.title: Entity Model v2 refactor
items.summary: Complete rewrite: 14 entity types (shared/types.ts), data migration script, store refactor (new data paths), 7 new route files (roadmap, epics, milestones, releases, systems, labels, automations), 6 existing routes updated, AI tools updated (actions→systems), UI overhauled (new Systems view, API client expanded, notifications, sidebar, dashboard). Migration preserves all existing data. Backward compat maintained.

items.title: Docs system + headless AI runner + automation engine + project init
items.summary: Full Doc entity CRUD (store, route, AI tools). Headless AI agent runner (premium model routing, 20-iteration tool loop). Automation engine with trigger evaluation and AI-driven execution. Scheduler (60s cron). 5 built-in automations seeded. Trigger hooks wired into watcher/session/roadmap/issues. Project init endpoint (scanner + git + AI agent). 4 new premium task types in model router.
